title: Accessibility problems
description: When launching the Help view, I need to first click on one of the "live" areas (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame) before it starts working properly. However, even after clicking, the tab key does not perform any action.
OB: When I launch the Help view, the tab key does not actually do anything.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Launch the Help view. 2. Try using the tab key to navigate. 3. Observe that the tab key does not perform any action.
